name: 王李吉
objective:
本課程採 中英雙語 授課，課程介紹前端網頁設計之入門教學，主要內容包括 HTML、JAVA SCRIPT，與期末專題等 3 授課內容。詳細內容包括：HTML、CSS、JAVA SCRIPT、DOM 文件物件模型、JQuery 函式庫、響應式網頁設計、Bootstrap 框架等，讓學生有能力設計一個基本的個人網站。
This course introduces the techniques of front-end web design, which main contents include HTML, JAVA SCRIPT, and Final Project, etc. The detail contents include: HTML, CSS, JAVA SCRIPT, DOM, JQuery library, Responsive Web Design (RWD), Bootstrap framework, etc. This course will make students have the ability to design a basic personal website.
schedule:
This is a Bilingual Courses (English and Chinese). This course aims to develop students' computational thinking, and help them understand the practical and application experience of computational thinking through web design.
The course will introduce the HTML5, CSS, and Javascript for building the web pages.All the result could be shown on the browser to help the students realize the relations between the design and the representation.
The students will have the experiences of web design and programming through the practice.

The topics in this course include:
1. Setting up the Visual Studio Code (VS code),
2. HTML syntax, 
3. CSS syntax, 
4. JavaScript and its application,
5. jQuery
6. HTML5 APIs syntactic features, 
7. CSS3 animation,  
8. Responsive web design (RWD)
